column5: I'll be hopping on a plane to Lutselke' in a couple of hours to go set up the network in our new learning centre there. While there I will be staying Here unfortunately. Might even have a day to get out fishin' plus I'll have time after work. Oh woe is me!!!!
I feel for ya man....Its a dirty job, but someones gotta do it
Awesome Great Slave Lake has always been on my to do list...one day...have fun at work eh!
Have fun in Looks OK. Fishing should be pretty decent just off the mouth of the river still....depends on the baitfish run.  Always interesting at FFL...Guy is a great cook too.
Guess you're too far away to see which finger I'm holdin' up?  Sometimes it's a tough life eh.
Make it easy on the guy will ya. Give him both, (one from each hand) I am.  I hope you can survive such a week. If you need support of any kind just let me know and I'll be there asap.
Ya, life is tough eh  Enjoy your stay and take some pics for us please  Oh, and try to get SOME work done okay
these folks that don't live near Toronto sure have it rough  wish I could rough it
